titleStmt.title: Prodigies & apparitions, or, Englands warning piece being a seasonable description by lively figures & apt illustration of many remarkable & prodigious fore-runners & apparent predictions of Gods wrath against England, if not timely prevented by true repentance / written by J. V.
titleStmt.author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Are to be sould by Tho. Bates ... by Ralphe Markland ...,
